links.target: Place the base on the stonecutter

data.text:
* To use this add-on, please turn on "Holiday Creator Features" in the world setting

Do you want to play any minecraft music wherever and whenever you want? Do you want to add your favorite music to listen to it in your survival world? You came to the right place, I present to you my first add-on, compatible with version 1.19Español: Quieres reproducir cualquier música del minecraft donde y cuando quieras? Quieres añadir tu música favorita para escucharla en tu mundo supervivencia? Viniste al lugar correcto, te presento mi primer add-on, compatible con la versión 1.19.

English:

First, we'll start by creating a speaker base.

Place the base on the stonecutter, select the available music speaker, I will add more designs soon.

This block plays 15 custom music at most, I tried to add more but the block stops working, I will improve the block in future updates.
To change music, you must interact with the block by touching it.

To play the music, crouch down and interact with the block again, repeat to stop the music.

Walkman:
The walkman allows you to listen to any music depending on the variants you get, all derived from its base version. Let's start by creating one.

This base will become the walkman of the dimension you want if you use it on top of a common block of that dimension, for example, if you want from the overworld you must use it on top of a grass block.

To change music, touch any block with the walkman, to play hold on android (use the item).

There are also variants of the creative, custom music and the menu, these are obtained by placing the base on the stonecutter. The record variant is obtained by using the base of the walkman on top of a jukebox block.

I made a demo video that includes the tutorial to add the music, take a look.


Español:

Primero, empezaremos creando una base de altavoz.

Coloca la base en el cortapiedras, selecciona el altavoz de música disponible, añadiré más diseños próximamente.

Este bloque reproduce 15 músicas personalizadas como máximo, traté de añadir más pero el bloque deja de funcionar, mejoraré el bloque en próximas actualizaciones.
Para cambiar de música, debes interactuar con el bloque tocándolo.

Para reproducir la música, agachate y vuelve a interactuar con el bloque, repite para detener la música.

El walkman te permite escuchar cualquier música dependiendo de las variantes que obtengas, todas derivan de su versión base.

Empecemos creando una.

Esta base se convertirá en el walkman de la dimensión que tu quieres si la usas estando encima de un bloque común de esa dimensión, por ejemplo, si quieres del overworld debes usarlo encima de un bloque de césped.

Para cambiar de música, toca cualquier bloque con el walkman, para reproducir mantén presionado en android (usa el item).

También hay variantes del creativo, músicas personalizadas y del menú, estas se obtienen colocando la base en el cortapiedras.

La variante de los discos de música se obtiene usando la base del walkman encima de un bloque tocadiscos.

Hice un video demostración que incluye el tutorial para añadir las músicas, échale un vistazo.


# How to install

• Download and install the McAddon
• Turn on "Holiday Creator Features" in the world setting
• Activate both behavior and resource pack in the game settings
data.title: Music Speaker Add-on - Add Your Favorite Music!

data.text:
Have you ever wanted to play survival on a Flat World but you find it hard to survive since there are only limited resources? Well this map is perfect for you... With this map you can play survival in a flat world and its EASIER then before. I've provided more resources for you to collect plus you can also finish the game with the end portal near at spawn.

Features:

• Portal near spawn- Since bedrock edition doesn't have portals in the flat world, I've provided one for you guys so that you can access the different dimensions as well. Although you have to provide your own resources like flint and steel for the nether portal and ender eyes for the end portal
• Provided Things- It will be easier to survive since a lot of things are provided for you such as bed, furnace, chests, bookshelves, saplings, and so much more. If that's not enough..... how about some pets such as wolves and allays. Villagers spawn eggs are also provided so that you can trade with more other stuffs.
• More Resources- With the help of commands, you can now have unlimited resources such as deepslate, granite, diorite, andesite, gravel, sand, and some ores. Very cool right? Now with these resources, you can make a lot of stuffs out of it and maybe some decorative designs to make your house beautiful.

What are you waiting for? Download now and beat the game in a flat survival world...
data.title: Easier Flat Survival 1.19

Get a fresh Minecraft overlay. Buttons and backgrounding are both brand-new. A tiny bit darker Minecraft. Try it, and if you like it, please subscribe to my channel on YouTube. Details are provided below. THX!

DARKMODELITE

Texturepack for Minecraft WINDOWS, ANDROID and IOS

ANDROID, IOS TRAILER

Hello,

the look of Minecraft will be altered with this pack.

After installation, the GUI and UI will change.

You will receive new bars for your experience, hunger, health, and armor.

Get a fresh Minecraft overlay.

Buttons and backgrounding are both brand-new. A tiny bit darker Minecraft.

Try it, and if you like it, please subscribe to my channel on YouTube.

Details are provided below.

THX! -zadro0

INFO

• It is compatible with the Minecraft WINDOWS, ANDROID and IOS Edition.
• Download the .mcpack file to get a new Minecraft GUI/UI.

SUBSCRIBE: www.youtube.com/zadro0

SOCIAL:

• YOUTUBE
• DISCORD
• TWITTER
• INSTAGRAM

# How to activate it

• Download and install the resource pack
• Activate the pack you installed in your world settings or global settings (Settings > Global resources)

data.text:
In this brand new minigame from Ancient Olympic, you have to mine ores and fight each other. In this 2-6 playermode you have to survive as long as possible. Last man standing wins. Diamond ores will give you the best loot, like throwable Tnt or diamond armor. Furthermore their is also copper for heal, gold for bow and blocks and iron for basic equipment. Also if you leftclick the white leather helmet the whole map will change to barriers for few seconds to see more diamond ores and your enemys. If the timer runs over the deathmatch will start, winner is the last player. You can play 4 diffrent maps. The mine, medieval room, alien and bone.

TRAILER

• Alien Map
• Medieval Map
• The Mine
• Bone Map

This needs 2 players. Max amount are 6 players. In this brand new minigame from Ancient Olympic, you have to mine ores and fight each other.

Installation

Download and install both McWorld and McAddon (addon is neccesarry to play)
data.title: Minebattle (Minigame)

links.target: You can craft one like this

data.text:
* To use this add-on, please turn on "Holiday Creator Features" in the world setting

Sixteen hats for Minecraft including Cowboy Hat, Wheelie Bin, Wizard Hats, Viking Helm, Jester Hat, Top Hat and many more! All are enchantable and provide a measure of Armor Protection. Some more than others!

Sixteen hats for your wearing pleasure. All are enchantable (some more than others) and all provide some level of protection. Some even provide knockback resistance. All provide 100% protection against sunburn. See below table for all the details.

You need to enable Holiday Creator Features in your world settings.

Hat Crafting Table

The first thing you'll need is a Hat Crafting Table. The astute among you may realize it's not a 'real' crafting table, it's a trader, and it works quite well.

You can craft one like this

Now you can place that down and get to business. 

Hats

All hats are repairable in the 'usual Minecraft way', i.e. combine with the same sort of hat. You can also repair with other items. See detailed table below. Some highlights:

Evil Wizard Hat

Very enchantable, good knockback resistance and protection. Repair with wool

Top Hat

Quite enchantable, some knockback resistance. Repair with wool. Won't grant tap-dance ability.

Wizard's Hat

Pretty much identical to the Evil Wizard's Hat.

Cap

Looks like something a plumber might wear. Not very durable, repair with wool.

Cowboy Hat

Time for a shoot out! Less enchantable, quite durable. Repair with string.

Jester Hat

Who even cares about the attributes of this hat, you want one! You can have one!

Santa Hat

Ho, ho, ho. One for Winter? Very enchantable and durable, good knockback resistance. Repair with wool.

Viking Hat

Very good protection and looks. Average elsewhere (and who cares).

Disguise

This will make you unrecognizable to everyone, so use when super-spy business is required.

Proof of its effectiveness, you'll never guess who is wearing the disguise:

Give up? It's Steve.

Wheelie Bin Hat

Let's face it, you'll be crafting this one first. But it's the most expensive of the lot. Excellent durability (these things are tough), great knockback resistance and a lot of protection.

Smiley Box

Turn that frown upside down! Very good durability, repair with concrete.

Hat Recipes

Full Hat Listing and Details

Our Youtube channel here!

We read all of our youtube comments, if you have something to say about our addons, please let us know!

To the awesome youtubers out there, if you do a review/showcase, thank you! Please link back to this page. Cheers!

# How to install

• Download and install the McAddon
• Turn on "Holiday Creator Features" in the world setting
• Activate both behavior and resource pack in the game settings
data.title: Hats and More Hats

data.title: Gigachad PE Addon

data.text:
Haunted Bunker is a thrilling escape adventure game, taking place in an abandoned underground bunker situated deep below the Bloodbloom Forest. This bunker is used to process illegally logged trees from Bloodbloom Forest and selling the precious "treehearts" for profit. This activity disturbed the spirits in that forest and they cursed the bunker, eventually killing everyone in it and no one is left alive. Beware the dark where the evil spirits lurks around and safe ground is nowhere to be found! Survive and reach till the end with all your might in this surreal horror game.

A daredevil decides to record a footage about himself exploring an abandoned bunker below the Bloodbloom Forest, which is rumored to be cursed by evil spirits of the Bloodbloom Forest, but fall asleep. However, when he wakes up from a weird dream, he found himself got locked up! Now it is not about the footage, it is all about ESCAPE!

In this game you become the daredevil, venture through the bunker and uncover hidden mysteries! You will know the full story while exploring the map, read all books in chest and lectern.

This game also test your logic skills, collect riddles all around the bunker and solve the puzzles to unlock doors. If the puzzles are too hard I may upload a tutorial video later.

There are three endings in this game, one good ending and two bad endings. Mind your actions as they will lead you to each ending (I will not spoil the endings here~). Reach for the exit before you become the next victim....

INSTRUCTIONS

Please turn off daylight cycle and mob spawning, do not turn on peaceful mode and activate command blocks. Do not cheat (don't break or use redstone torches and lever on cctvs unless cases like disappearing key happen). Most jumpscares include sound effect, so headphones are recommended for the best experience.

FEATURES

This map contains three different endings and is multiplayer friendly.

DISCLAIMER

You are warned as it contains many jumpscares, scary images, flashing lights and loud sounds.

This is my first map, so hope you guys enjoy ;)
data.title: Haunted Bunker

finally admin addons release 2.2, this addon can help you manage server/realm, There are many features in this addon such as Vanish, Sudo and many more see complete addon info below

Addon Features :

• Vanish
• Time Set
• Weather
• Teleport
• Kick Player (only on server and realm, and you can't kick yourself)

• Broadcast

• Admin Tools
• Give Gift
• Prank
• Clear Inventory

# How to install

• Turn on "GameTest Framework" in the world setting
• Activate both behavior and resource pack in the game settings

data.text:
Resource Pack: Jerm's Better Leaves(Java)
Shaders: Complementary (Java)

# Introduction

Welcome to my new series called "Top Modern Mansions" it's a series of modern mansions that all the talented creators make in the community.

• This is the 29th map of the series the rest will be uploaded as time goes by. 
• Because of different physics on Minecraft, some parts of the building will be damaged, such as armor stands, paintings, custom heads, etc...

# Credits

• These schematics came from "yolo1233". He's the one who made the schematics and gave me permission to port it to MCPE.

# Bug Fixes

• The update block corrupting the world has now been solved.
• World Clipping has not been fixed in this version.

# Note

• This world is created on Minecraft PE version 1.19

You can show your support by leaving a review, Thank you! Enjoy~
data.title: Top Modern Mansion - 29 (COD RAID)

Characteristic

• Speed: 270KM/H
• Health:40

How the Addon works, This vehicle can be obtained by crafting it with iron and paper

• Activate both behavior and resource pack in the game settings

data.text:
Have you ever desired to play Poppy Playtime, functioning on Minecraft? Well, I present to you, my own map with help of HD aNimates, BendytheDemon18, and FTL (Funtime Lefty): Poppy Playtime: A tight squeeze + Fly in a web. In this map, you'll have to swing with your blue grabpack, open doors with your red hand, get electricity with your green hand, and dare to confront Mommy Long Legs. This map is a little bit different from the real one, but it will be enough. There are some bugs around which I will be able to fix when the map gets published, but if you find one, put yourself in creative and don't mind the glitch. I asked permission from all the addon makers, so everything is legal.

I hope you enjoy the map I made with BendyTheDemon18, FFL, and HD aNimates.

Also, no respawn is permitted until I make a new update.

• Playtime.CO's principal room
• Red hand room
• Make a friend room
• Poppy's room
• Chapter 2 starting hallway
• Eliot's room 
• Poppy's kidnap room
• Game station
• Musical Memory
• Wack a Wuggy
• Statues

PLEASE PUT YOUR PERMISSIONS LIKE THIS

AND SET YOUR BRIGHTNESS TO 0

I asked BendytheDemon18, FFL, and HD aNimates
data.title: Poppy Playtime: A Tight Squeeze + Fly in a Web
